sentences: Ta on näinud paluusi kohti maailmas.
Meie kool oli näinud häid tulemusi.
Tema on näinud kõik need filmid.
context: The word 'näinud' is the past tense, partitive form of the Estonian verb 'nägima', which means 'to see' or 'to watch'. In this case, it functions as the past participle and is typically used with the auxiliary verb 'olema' (to be) to form compound tenses. For example: 'Olen näinud seda filmi varem' means 'I have seen this movie before'. The word indicates that someone has witnessed or observed something in the past.
